column5: My son had an usual catch while at Poverty Lake out of Nakina. Caught a hunter's boot in the lake. Anyone have any info on this?

as long as there was no foot in it...good to go, just part of the fun and adventure. Now if you happen to snag a gold Seiko watch on Lac Seul just south of Hungry Narrows, let me know. lost it putting on my PFD about 6 yrs ago.

This post reminded me of something I lost overboard on Eagle Lake. Has anyone caught a pair of subscription sunglasses around the large rocks sticking out of the water to the left of the entrance to the West Arm? Lost 15+ years ago.
One thing about it, with subscription sunglasses you get new pair in the mail each month. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Ha!!! didn't notice that. Wish that was the case, cost me $500+ to replace.
I caught a pretty new net on Abram Lake last week.
I've snagged some really weird live bait rigs that I thought, that guy caught a break losing that albatross!!!
What size, left or right??? FT

Reminds me of the Green Bays Packers sweatshirt caught by my sister on her first ever fly-in to Kearns Lake in 2014 Phishfearme named the bay where it was caught Sweatshirt Bay and wrote it on the camp map
